amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute is intended to increase collections on delinquent nontax debt owed to the Federal government; improve Federal payment systems and travel management; and decrease high value nontax debt totaling over $1 million.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Davis (VA).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (VA) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
